name: Detective Kara: The Final Case
description:
Detective Kara: The Final Case was developed during the BUG GAME JAM 2017 FALL in 48 hours.

The game is a point&click adventure game with 2D graphics. It depicts the short story involving Detective Kara and a recent unsolved murder. As a veteran on his job, this new case will be an easy one for the Detective, or he thinks. Play this short game and find out!

The game was developed with Unity Game Engine. As a game jam product, it has a short gameplay duration. You can move around the crime scenes. 

First Case:

Foot->Boulder->Shoe->Right Pressure Plate->Keyhole->Scroll

Second Case:

Bloodstain (Try clicking a couple of times)->Yellow tile->Box->Keyhole->Scroll
